name: Trashmas in Trent Town
description:
Krampus needs to give the naughty children coal for Christmas! Trouble is, Santa burned down his grotto last year! He is reduced to scavenging in the Stoke-on-Trent landfill site.

Help him scavenge for loot, hire dwarves and mine coal to give all the bad kids their dusty, crumbly and completely inedible Christmas presents!

WASD to move.

Click to dig and place blocks.

1-5 and Arrows to control hotbar.

Q to sell blocks.
E to buy tools.
R to enter/exit the Range (where you can buy tools).

Escape to exit.

Play your own music, there is no sound.
Dwarves not yet moved into Stoke-on-Trent.
